title: UP-RISE Project
text:
Transforming Dredged Sediments into Tomorrow’s Infrastructure.
Unlocking the Potential of Dredged Sediments for Resilient and Sustainable Infrastructure (UP-RISE) is a research project funded by the Marie Skłodowska-Curie Actions (MSCA) Postdoctoral Fellowship under the Horizon Europe programme (Project No. 101129741). It is hosted by Østfold University College (Norway), co-supervised by OsloMet, and developed in collaboration with the industrial partner NETICS (Netherlands).
UP-RISE is dedicated to pioneering sustainable, circular solutions for the reuse of dredged sediments in civil engineering. By converting these underutilized materials into high-performance, low-carbon construction components, the project supports the transition toward climate-resilient infrastructure and aligns with the EU Green Deal and global sustainability goals.
Through interdisciplinary research, experimental development, and industry collaboration, UP-RISE explores innovative binders, performance optimization, and real-world applications of sediment-based materials.






Note



Get in touch: aesafhi@hiof.no

title: Meet the Team
text:
Dr. Mahdi Kioumarsi







Dr. Mahdi KIOUMARSI is a Professor at OsloMet University & HiØ. With a Ph.D. from NTNU, he focuses on sustainable materials, structural engineering, & concrete technologies. He leads the Structural Engineering Laboratory & SmartVED lab at OsloMet. He has many published papers, led international research projects, & serves on editorial boards of scientific journals.

Contact: mahdi.kioumarsi@hiof.no

title: Meet the Team
text:
Dr. Shima PILEHVAR




Dr. Shima PILEHVAR







Dr. Shima PILEHVAR is an Associate Professor at HiØ, with a Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering. Her research focuses on sustainable materials including geopolymer concrete, 3D printed concrete, & lunar construction. She has published extensively on advanced concrete technologies & thermal performance enhancements.

Contact: shima.pilehvar@hiof.no

title: Meet the Team
text:
Dr. Amine Safhi




Dr. Amine Safhi







Dr. Amine SAFHI, currently MSCA Research Fellow at HiØ. He holds a Ph.D. in Civil Engineering, & has a strong background in sustainable construction, circular economy, & sustainability. He had participated in multi-disciplinary research projects focusing on recycling by-products including mining waste & dredged sediments as construction materials.

Contact: aesafhi@hiof.no
